backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with user profiles, templates, bio pages, sharing logic, and system template seeds plus authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to modified files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing UI pages, components, and subscription‑removal changes.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and dark mode settings for the app’s design system.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, auth guards, and page mappings for the frontend.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header component with navigation, login/logout handling, and conditional Pro‑only upload links.
frontend/src/components/LinksEditor.tsx: Form component allowing users to add, edit, and remove link entries in a bio page.
frontend/src/components/PaymentQrUploade: Component for uploading and previewing a QR image with progress tracking and removal support.
frontend/src/components/SocialHandlesEdi: Editor UI for adding, updating, and removing social media handles with selectable platforms.
frontend/src/components/TemplateCard.tsx: Displays a template card with thumbnail, metadata, and a button to navigate to the detailed template view.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Exports a static list of template categories and a CategoryType type derived from it.
frontend/src/data/seedTemplates.ts: Provides a large predefined list of seed template objects for fallback or initial template data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login flow, persistence, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, templates, subscriptions, and related data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme CSS variables, applies base styles, and adds screenshot‑protection rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders UPI-based checkout flow allowing users to submit payment reference and activate a subscription.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays marketing landing page with login flow and redirects logged-in users to templates.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows Premium and Pro subscription tiers, feature lists, and routes users to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/SharedBioPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a shared bio page with social handles and links, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Provides a profile setup form for new users and submits data to create their account.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateDetailPage.ts: Displays a single template’s details, handles screenshot-prevention, and routes users to edit or return if not found.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateEditorPage.ts: Provides a form to customize and save a bio page from a template and generates a share URL after saving.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateGalleryPage.t: Shows all templates with category filtering, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTemplatePage.ts: Allows Pro users to upload new templates with metadata and thumbnail handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, including schema metadata and a list of implemented features covering backend canisters, storage, authentication, and various frontend pages and editors. Serves as a structured inventory of existing functionality for the Liinks template marketplace.
